page.title: 16A Typical Schoolday
page.content: I get up at seven thirty in the morning.After that I get dressed and I clean my teeth and comb my hair.I have breakfast around about eight o'clock and I normaly have weetabix and a cup of tea and toast with peanut butter and syrup or marmalade. I go to school at half past eight and I arrive at school around about twenty to nine .I play with the fourth year boys in the play ground and we play cricket. At school I enjoy doing maths and project work .I eat sandwiches for lunch. I get home from school at ten to four and I ride my BMX around Broughton village or I watch TV.I have supper at six o'clock.I normally have pizza,boiled potatoes and baked beans.I go to bed at nine thirty.
